item.description:
Come and visit together in Arlington's brand new fenced in dog park. This beautiful new park has a large fenced in play area for the general population of dogs as well as a smaller fenced in area for small/timid dogs. There are two cement tunnels and a plank walk for some basic agility work, shaded wooden benches for us owners, as well as water fountains and doggie bag dispensers. There is free parking near by and the dog park is accessible via the bike path.

Would love to see folks come and visit. I've suggested this date (selfishly because I know I'm available), and the time could be flexible.


Here is link to a few photos:
http://arlington.patch.com/articles/photos-dogs-at-play#photo-10031770

Rules for the park:

http://www.arlingtonma.gov/Public_Documents/ArlingtonMA_Recreation/Dogs/thorndike

 

***Time change****   11a  to hopefully beat the heat/rain!

group.name: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel Lovers of MA

item.name: Thorndike Dog Park
